name: wid1_F2F1_module10
label: F2F 1: parents on children (CAPI)
description: This questionnaire module contains questions on: competence rating of social skills, oral skills, concentration ability, communications skills, mathematic ability, general knowledge; current subjective health; diagnoses (adults and children); doctor's visit; existence of grandparents and frequency of meetings; heigth, weight, bmi; impairment caused by diseases; medication; occurence of externalising problem behavior (e.g. being restless and easily distracted, having tantrums, lying and cheating); occurence of internalising problem behavior (e.g. headaches and nausea, nervousness, and being easily scared); patience; personality measures (BIG5); risk aversion; self esteem; social capital of individuals, e.g., close friends, frequency of social contacts, loneliness; social participation: frequency of attendance in sports clubs, theatre, music groups or volunteer organizations; use of electronic media devices (time spent with, e.g., computer, internet, etc.), rules for media use; year of immigration, country of birth, residential status, language spoken at home.

items.text: . . . has many worries, often seems worried.

items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . is often unhappy, down-hearted or tearful.
items.text_de: . . . ist oft ungluecklich oder niedergeschlagen; weint haeufig.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . is nervous or clingy in new situations, easily loses confidence.
items.text_de: . . . ist nervoes oder anklammernd in neuen Situationen; verliert leicht das Selbstvertrauen.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . has many fears, easily scared.
items.text_de: . . . hat viele Aengste; fuerchtet sich leicht.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . is rather solitary, tends to play alone.
items.text_de: . . . ist Einzelgaenger; spielt meist alleine.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . has at least one good friend.
items.text_de: . . . hat einen oder mehrere gute Freunde oder Freundinnen.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . is generally liked by other children.
items.text_de: . . . ist im Allgemeinen bei anderen Kindern beliebt.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . is picked on or bullied by other children.
items.text_de: . . . wird von anderen gehaenselt oder schikaniert.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . gets on better with adults than with other children.
items.text_de: . . . kommt besser mit Erwachsenen aus als mit anderen Kindern.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . .  is restless, overactive; cannot stay still for long.
items.text_de: . . . ist unruhig, ueberaktiv, kann nicht lange stillsitzen.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . is constantly fidgeting or squirming.
items.text_de: . . . ist staendig zappelig.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . is easily distracted, concentration wanders.
items.text_de: . . . ist leicht ablenkbar, unkonzentriert.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . thinks things out before acting
items.text_de: . . . denkt nach, bevor er/sie handelt.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . sees tasks through to the end, has good attention span.
items.text_de: . . . fuehrt Aufgaben zu Ende; gute Konzentrationsspanne.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . often has temper tantrums or hot tempers.
items.text_de: . . . hat oft Wutanfaelle; ist aufbrausend.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . is generally obedient, usually does what adults request.
items.text_de: . . . ist im Allgemeinen folgsam; macht meist, was Erwachsene verlangen.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . often fights with other children or bullies them.
items.text_de: . . . streitet sich oft mit anderen Kindern oder schikaniert sie.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . often lies or cheats.
items.text_de: . . . luegt oder mogelt haeufig.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . steals from home, school or elsewhere.
items.text_de: . . . stiehlt zu Hause, in der Schule oder anderswo.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
